amendment.description: An amendment to zero out funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development and apply the savings of $645 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development and apply the savings of $645 million to the spending reduction account.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Polis amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Polis.
